game_description: HEGIAS VR is the world's first automated and cloud-based solution for visualization and communication with virtual reality in planning, construction and real estate. 3D plans can be entered, materialized and furnished in the virtual world by several people, regardless of location and hardware, at any time during the planning phase by drag n' drop them into an Internet browser. HEGIAS VR reduces misunderstandings with all stakeholders, supports the planning, sales and leasing process.
review_1: It's a real estate thing, of seemingly moderate quality.
review_2: The easiest and fastest way to have a walk-through experience in an unbuilt appartment/house - together with peers all around the globe. I am loving it.
